overview: Mannheim Steamroller Live celebrates 30 years of holiday magic and 40 years of groundbreaking Fresh Aire compositions with this benchmark release from Grammy Award-winning composer Chip Davis and the group known for blending classical music styles and rock.  Mannheim Steamroller Live was captured in high definition video and recorded in surround sound over two nights in December 2014 at the Orpheum Theater in Omaha, Nebraska
title: Mannheim Steamroller Live
